content:
System.ServiceModel.Activities.Presentation.Factories Namespace

Definition

Contains factories that create Receive/SendReply and Send/ReceiveReply activity pairs.

In this Article

Classes

ReceiveAndSendReplyFactory

Creates a configured instance of Receive and SendReply activity pairs.
SendAndReceiveReplyFactory

Creates a configured instance of Send and ReceiveReply activity pairs.
